pages.text: $(li)Iron Block is a new decorative block that can be used to save $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/iron_ingot)Iron Ingots$(/l) in a more efficient way and to craft an $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/anvil)Anvil$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)This block can be affected by a $(l:patchouli:redstone/quark/magnet)Magnet$(/l).
